articles.title: Georgia State tops Appalachian State in Sun Belt opener
articles.description: BOONE, N.C. (AP) — Freshman Jalen Thomas came off the bench to score a career-high 14 points and Georgia State jumped out to a big lead and held off Appalachian State 69-60 in a Sun Belt Conference opener on Thursday…
articles.content:
BOONE, N.C. (AP) Freshman Jalen Thomas came off the bench to score a career-high 14 points and Georgia State jumped out to a big lead and held off Appalachian State 69-60 in a Sun Belt Conference opener on Thursday night.
Thomas hit all seven of his shots fr… [+842 chars]

articles.title: Young scores 18 to lead Charlotte past UAB 51-44
articles.description: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — Jahmir Young had 18 points as Charlotte topped UAB 51-44 on Thursday night.
articles.content:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) Jahmir Young had 18 points as Charlotte topped UAB 51-44 on Thursday night.
Both teams were playing their first Conference USA game of the season.
Cooper Robb had 10 points for Charlotte (7-5).
Neither team was able to get much going o… [+828 chars]

articles.title: 7 charged in California party shooting that killed 4
articles.description: FRESNO, Calif. (AP) — Seven gang members were charged Thursday in state and federal court in the shooting deaths of four men at a backyard party in California, prosecutors said.
articles.content:
FRESNO, Calif. (AP) Seven gang members were charged Thursday in state and federal court in the shooting deaths of four men at a backyard party in California, prosecutors said.
The victims were killed Nov. 17 when gunmen entered the yard of a Fresno home thro… [+2152 chars]

articles.title: Board grants retirement for ex-officer who fatally shot teen
articles.description: PHOENIX (AP) — A retirement board granted early accidental disability retirement to a former Tempe police officer who fatally shot a teenager who was holding a replica gun and fleeing from a vehicle burglary.
articles.content:
PHOENIX (AP) A retirement board granted early accidental disability retirement to a former Tempe police officer who fatally shot a teenager who was holding a replica gun and fleeing from a vehicle burglary.
